sentences.english: Conclusion Gram positive organisms are major pathogens of bacteremia in critically ill patients.
sentences.chinese: 结论革兰阳性球菌是危重病患者菌血症的重要致病菌。

sentences.english: Conclusion "Zhishi Xiaopi Decoction" is effective to improve the gastrointestinal dysfunction in severe patients.
sentences.chinese: 结论枳实消痞方能改善危重病患者胃肠道障碍。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relation between stress hyperglycemia and prognosis of imminent neonate.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨危重新生儿预后与应激性高血糖之间的关系。

sentences.english: Both patients are in critical conditions.
sentences.chinese: 两名患者都处在危重状态。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of intensive insulin therapy on the critical illness patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究强化胰岛素治疗在危重病患者中的临床疗效。

sentences.english: The medicine of critical disease is a clinical discipline that gradually sprang up in the late 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 危重病医学是在60年代末逐步兴起的临床学科。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience and the management of surgical treatment for critical cardiac valve disease during perioperative period.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨危重心脏瓣膜病手术治疗和围术期处理。

sentences.english: She was diagnosed to have pneumonia and is now in a critical condition.
sentences.chinese: 病人被诊断为患有肺炎，现在病情危重。

sentences.english: Sepsis is one of common critical diseases.
sentences.chinese: 脓毒症是常见的危重病。

sentences.english: The management of blood glucose for critical care patients has been frequently metioned nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 最近对于危重患者的血糖管理这一话题经常被谈及。

sentences.english: The fast different that ⑤ cardiogram discerns hard temporarily rhythm of the heart, the person that illness danger is weighed.
sentences.chinese: 心电图一时难以辨明的快速异位心律，病情危重者。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the applicative value partial peripheral nutrition(PPN) on neonates in Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析部分静脉营养在危重新生儿中的应用价值。

sentences.english: Frodo remains in a critical condition at a wildlifehospital on the Sunshine Coast.
sentences.chinese: 弗罗多在阳光海岸野生动物医院还处在危重状态。

sentences.english: Acute myocardial infarction is a very serious disease with a high mortality.
sentences.chinese: 急性心肌梗死是冠心病中的危重症，病死率高。

sentences.english: So hospital staffers told the relatives of critically ill patients to go buy their own.
sentences.chinese: 因此，医院员工让危重病人的家属自己去买这些东西。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the prevention and treatment effect of rhubarb on gastrointestinal function failure in critical Illness.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大黄对危重症患者胃肠功能衰竭的防治作用。

definition: to provide critical care (to a patient or a diseased plant)
to transfer (a patient) to a different hospital/to transfer to hospital (e.g. a prisoner)
sick personnel/person on the sick list/patient
child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
